attributes.action: make school weeks 4 days instead of 5
attributes.additional_details: so everyone child will be able to enjoy there experience at school more
attributes.background: make the school weeks shorter to 4 days so kids can catch up on sleep easier and will be able to concentrate and focus in school at all times. also so pork chops arnt on there cases at times

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Change the school week to a four day week: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643506
